alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Central Oregon Coast Range (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 09 at 9:23PM PDT until August 10 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS WITH ABUNDANT LIGHTNING EXPECTED THIS EVENING ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE CASCADES...CASCADE FOOTHILLS... WILLAMETTE VALLEY AND COAST RANGE... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT WEDNESDAY FOR THUNDERSTORMS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 603... The National Weather Service in Portland has issued a Red Flag Warning for thunderstorms, which is in effect until 6 AM PDT Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 603 East Slopes of the Central Oregon Coast Range. * THUNDERSTORMS...LAL 3 (Scattered thunderstorms). * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning and critically dry fuels may result in numerous fire starts. Thunderstorm outflow winds may result in erratic fire spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Central Oregon Coast Range
